definition: to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Also, it is possible to obtain provisional approval to teach without a teaching certificate or license for many schools.
sentences.chinese: 另外，你也能憑藉臨時批件在其他類型的學校教書。

sentences.english: Experience in new drug certificates or production licenses is more favorable.
sentences.chinese: 具有新藥證書或生產批件註冊報批的經歷者優先。

sentences.english: The rabies vaccine using PICKCa adjuvant has been licensed for clinical study.
sentences.chinese: 皮卡佐劑狂犬病疫苗已取得國家臨牀研究批件。

sentences.english: However, you have to add material, put your operating vehicle documents attached.
sentences.chinese: 不過，你要補充個材料，把你們經營汽車的批件附上。

sentences.english: Copy of application approved by general manager shall be made for financial director.
sentences.chinese: 總經理批准的呈批件必須抄送財務負責人。

sentences.english: PAP did not apply to the all suppliers.
sentences.chinese: 生產件批件過程不能被應用於所有的供方。

definition: official written ruling in response to a submission/official approval in writing

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Shi2 pin3 Yao4 pin3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 ju2
related.word: 國家食品藥品監督管理局

definition: document identifier code (typically including an abbreviation for the name of the issuing organization, the date and a serial number)
State Food and Drug Administration (SFDA)/abbr. for 國家食品藥品監督管理局|国家食品药品监督管理局[Guo2 jia1 Shi2 pin3 Yao4 pin3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 ju2]
to report for criticism/to submit for approval to higher authority

pinyin: Shi2 pin3 Yao4 pin3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 ju2

definition: to test a random sample/to spot-check
to review a judicial case/to reexamine
